Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

OOC: Will everyone please read this its an important moment for me.

:::Bluestreak/Andromeda/Sideswipe/Ratchet:::

::They had once again been talking for hours.  Soon Bluestreak realizes that 
he could talk to Andromeda about anything.  He realized that there was no one 
in the entire universe hed rather be with than her.  The time was right::
Bluestreak: A-andromeda?
Andromeda: What is it love?
::Bluestreak kneels down::
Bluestreak: I-I know we havent been together very long, but the time we've 
spent together has been the greatest time of my life.
::His hand compartment opens, a ring inside::
Bluestreak: Wil-will you marry me?
::Andromeda's speechless.  her spark starts beating really fast::
Andromeda: Yes.
::Their arms wrap around each other and they kiss more passionatly then they 
had ever before::
Bluestreak: i got it all planned out.  We say goodbye to all our friends here 
and we flee the war.  we go where no Predacons will ever look for us.
Andromeda: Where?
::Bluestreak smiles::
Bluestreak: The Andromeda galaxy!(not making this up.  there IS an Andromeda 
galaxy)
Andromeda:  Oh my god!!
Bluestreak: Thats right!  The 4th planet- perfect for life and uninhabited by 
Transformers!(my fantasy)  We'll live in prosperity for the rest of our lives!
Andromeda: Than lets get to the Ark and say goodbye to our friends!
Bluestreak: Unfortunatly, no time.  I'll commlink them.
::He opens up a comm to Ratchet and Sideswipe::
Bluestreak: To my dearest friends.  Andromeda and I are getting married and 
running away! Ratchet, you are my best friend.  I wouldnt have made it 
without you.  Sideswipe, dont die on me any time soon! Farewell!
::At the ark, Ratchet and Sideswipe gave three cheers for Bluestreak.  
Bluestreak now opens a private comm to Prowl::
Bluestreak: hey brother!  Me and Andromeda are getting married and leaving.  
When you get the chance, go to the CF and find my daggers.  I want you to 
have them.  It was nice seeing you after all these years. Goodbye!
::Bluestreak soon constructed a ship built for 2 and he and his new bride 
flew to the 4th planet of the Andromeda galaxy, where they lived happily ever 
after for the rest of their days::

OOC: This is the end for Bluestreak and Andromeda.  they will no longer 
participate in the Neo Beast Wars.

--part1_b5.2f9bb39.273cbaed_boundary
